comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Becky Edelson, "militant orator of the Industrial Workers of the World" went on hunger strike in June 1914.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: IWW INVADES TARRYTOWN: New York Times story, May 31, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F40D1FFD345D13...

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Full size versions of the Becky Edelson pictures from the Bain Collection are now on Wikimedia Commons: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Becky_Edelson

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks so much for connecting up the pictures, people, and event through the sources you cite - and for locating more name information for Edelson/Edelsohn in another view of her: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5536912357/ . We'll add information to the description when we update.
